text: "Boy I wish it were." Earlier this week Bernie Sanders declared that the only reason groups like Planned Parenthood the Human Rights Campaign and NARAL are supporting Hillary Clinton is that theyre part of the so-called political "establishment." So what does Hillary think—is Planned Parenthood part of the establishment? "As Hillary points out: If an organization like Planned Parenthood really were part of the establishment Democrats wouldnt have to work so hard to defend it against Republican attacks." Theres too much at stake in this election for womens rights and LGBT rights to dismiss the organizations that fight for them as "establishment." n
